page.title: 12THE POTTERY SHOP
page.content: The Pottery Shop has been in existence for 2 years. It takes two minutes to make an average size piece of pottery. After that it has to be fired and decorated. The Potter would like the shop to be a bit bigger so that she could work in the premises rather than at home. The Potter is quite skilled at making pottery as she went to Art School before she was married. The most expensive thing she has ever made was a big pot which cost about Â£7O but she would not sell it. In the height of the summer she gets about lOO visitors a day. They come from all over the world. She had a very interesting customer who bought quite a lot of her pottery.
